snippet: But this, alas! was no time for the sweet dalliance of courtship, asthat other hour had been ! They must lose not a minute in letting thejoyful truth be known to those anxious searchers and that throngingcrowd of onlookers at " The Doocot." A turn in the road had tillnow served to conceal from Lizzie Fairlie the alarming spectacle, butat last many voices mingling in one hoarse murmur reached herears, while lights flitting here and there came more prominently intoview.
